diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts of Special Education.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    SpecialEducation[Special Education] --> IDEA[IDEA]
    SpecialEducation --> Categories[Categories of Disabilities]
    SpecialEducation --> Processes[Processes]
    IDEA --> FAPE[FAPE]
    IDEA --> LRE[LRE]
    IDEA --> IEP[IEP]
    Categories --> SLD[Specific Learning Disability]
    Categories --> ASD[Autism Spectrum Disorder]
    Processes --> Evaluation[Evaluation]
    Processes --> Placement[Placement]
